topic.title: FrameworkJS
topic.body:
Easy click-to-begin framework, where you can begin your brand new site
http://127.0.0.1:43110/fmwk.bit/

3_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK.body:
Take a look at Zirch Automated Search's source code.
It reads data from 0list.
Horizon can get zites from 0list, ZeroSites and others.

> [blurhy](#comment_21_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): The data of 0list and others is not enough for the search engine,i think

Use a button in every result, then user can suggest improvements, and you/zite owner approves.
Also, a button where zite owner can claim ownership.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_20_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): If you find links on the sites it is linking to, i think you may discover maybe more than double number of sites For example GFWTalk is large forum that can contain many external links.. In the sidebar of the Important Zites the @krixano made a search in ZeroUp and ZeroMe also.

Good idea, to crawl zite's links like Google does.
And show ZeroMe/Forums posts, ZeroUp files, KopyKate videos, etc.

> [blurhy](#comment_22_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): The data maybe huge.

Use optional files and merger zites.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_21_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): 
Another thing is, when i search for "nettalk", it shows two entries both for same site, one .bit one standard address, 

Zirch shows the two addresses (Bitcoin and .bit) in the same result.

> [blurhy](#comment_23_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): 
Also I'm going to write a spider that crawls user data and get the keywords.That spider will returns topic url.

If you want, I can host this spider in the host I'm buying.
The creator of 0net proxy also can do it.

> [blurhy](#comment_24_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): i added a lot of features today,but not publish yet.i will add that tomorrow

Do you have a GitHub repo for issue tracking and pull requests?

> [blurhy](#comment_25_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): I added some Cross Origin Search features.That's useful.Added zerosites,zerotalk,plan to add zerowiki and more

Would be nice if you add ZeroWiki cards.

> [blurhy](#comment_26_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): The right side container is for zerowiki

You can also support Kiwipedia, and filter duplications.
For sample, if ZeroWiki article is already in Kiwipedia, prioritize Kiwipedia.

1538494898_1FKuNsExQML7APuNmkCV8uzB5pKup.body:
> [swastika](#comment_11_1b9urVTLtAAZAidg6hchWqhrVtYXUaoj7): @piloth I haven't done much on ZeroNet myself, I will create some sites in the near future myself.

Is you JS developer?

> [piloth](#comment_20_1FKuNsExQML7APuNmkCV8uzB5pKupcmnck): You as well. I'm more of an artist than a coder so if you need any design done let me know. Peace!

Do you have DeviantArt acc?

1536295116_1H9xiQsJ6r4t9aTsf7fgGXJi8ZUpc.body: What is the diff between ZeroLSTN and Mixtape?

1_1FKuNsExQML7APuNmkCV8uzB5pKupcmnck.body: Please don't use auto play videos

1544369872_15hL2gR4oCSgKBbndn3MxY8Hc5xoy.body:
> [psybin](#comment_1_1FEureQqgUD5PLLxvaMWajQUzfzRAwJ4UE): I just started working with javascript on my zite, and one piece of code works fine, but I'm trying to do a collapsible/accordion div and it's just not working. Do I need something other than ZeroFrame.js? It just doesn't make sense since this is a simple bit of code.

Try a funny thing: Access FrameworkJS, click on "Create your own zite", and on your brand new project, try to use that collapsible/accordion
Tell me if that works
